short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Switch between tabs every x seconds,Reload tabs every x minutes, Put browser in fullscreen, Reload startup pages

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your shared spaces with Tab Refresh, the essential Chrome extension designed to keep your dashboards and billboards fresh and engaging! 
Whether you're displaying real-time data, announcements, or captivating visuals, Tab Refresh ensures your content is always up-to-date and error-free.

Key Features:

•  Seamless Tab Switching: Effortlessly switch between multiple tabs with customizable timers, allowing you to curate the perfect viewing experience for your audience.
•  Automatic Page Reloading: Keep your content current by setting timers to automatically reload pages, ensuring that your viewers always see the latest information without manual intervention.
•  Fullscreen Mode: Maximize your display space by forcing your browser into fullscreen mode, creating an immersive experience that captures attention.
•  URL Memory: Never lose your original content! Tab Refresh remembers the URLs you loaded initially, allowing you to restore them instantly if a refresh leads to an error page or unwanted redirect.

Elevate your presentations and shared displays with Tab Refresh, the smart solution for dynamic content management. 

Download now and keep your audience engaged with fresh, real-time updates!
